events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size does not fit me and I no longer want to keep it.
The customer's request has been identified as a Refund inquiry concerning the return and money back for a product.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M., who handles refund requests and product returns.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I am here to help with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or washed so we can proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket has not been used or washed; it is still in the original condition with tags.
Thank you for the info. You are eligible for a full refund. Please ship the jacket back using our prepaid label, and once received, we will credit your account within five business days.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate how quickly you are handling this.
I have sent you the prepaid shipping label by email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just following up to confirm you were able to send the jacket back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday. Thank you again for your help throughout this process.
Your refund case has been successfully closed. We hope to serve you again soon!
We have sent you a short survey to gather feedback about your refund experience. Your input is appreciated.
